name: AnkleBrachialIndex
title: Ankle Brachial Index
description: The systolic pressure at the ankle divided by the systolic pressure at the arm (Business ID: Entry 3423286)
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values addresses terms representing Ankle Brachial Index.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this set of values is to identify patients who have a/an the systolic pressure at the ankle divided by the systolic pressure at the arm.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes LOINC codes for Ankle Brachial Index.),(Exclusion Criteria: Terms not representative of observable encoded terms that may have values indicating Ankle Brachial Index.)
